name: Tim Entrepreneur
description:
"Tim Entrepreneur is a game where you incarnate a teenager, Tim, who's tired of not making enough money."

Who then decides to the streets to go and invest his 100 dollars worth of money

--- Gameplay ---

In a shark tank fashion you'll meet NPCs that will give you choices, but, you can only pick one and, be fast! The countdown is ticking!

--- Made for the 85th Mini Jam ---

  • Sound Design : justAguy_bro#1360
  • Music : WarxTron#2496
  • Pixel Art : Rhaskia#3711
  • Coding : Sawcce#8188
Theme : GOLD Limitation : One-Minute Timer
